name: Quotify - a quotes app
shortDescription:
An app that provides motivational quotes on beautiful backgrounds to help users stay motivated.

This app is built with Jetpack Compose, Material Design 3, Room, Navigation Components, Kotlin Coroutin
longDescription:
An app that provides motivational quotes on beautiful backgrounds to help users stay motivated.

This app is built with Jetpack Compose, Material Design 3, Room, Navigation Components, Kotlin Coroutin
